TestInformation.Title: YafaRay
TestInformation.Description: YafaRay is an open-source physically based montecarlo ray-tracing engine.
TestInformation.SubTitle: Total Time For Sample Scene

TestProfile.ExternalDependencies: build-utilities, cmake, python, zlib-development, libpng-development, libxml2, tiff, swig, opencv, freetype, jpeg-development, openexr
